text: Hanavetinka eri'zama e'nerinka, maragu'zama netinka, maka knazama e'nerinka, kazigazima hunka nevunka, havi zamavu'zmava nehaza vahe'enema tragotenka omaninka, havige hu'za aposol vahe mani'none nehaza vahera refko huzmantenka negenka, havige nehaze hunkama nehanazana, Nagra ke'na antahi'na hu'noe.
